casebody.data:
Keaton
v.
ERMC III, et al. 262P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 8, 2016 M. Duane Jones, Joseph D. Delfino, Attorneys at Law, Charlotte, For ERMC III, et al. Shannon Warf Wilson, Attorney at Law, For Keaton, Ronald G. (Jr.). Ervin, J.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th of October 2016 by Defendants to Withdraw Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of December 2016."
